name: VASANTHA MEMORIAL TRUST
briefDescription: The Vasantha Memorial Trust was formed in memory of Mrs. Vasantha in the year 1993 with a mission to make cancer never. It had its beginning in Trichy & today it operates from 3 cities, viz: Chennai, Coimbatore & Mumbai. More than 850 cancer patients have been sponsored till date and a large chunk is children with blood cancers and women with breast cancers. It provides counseling & rehabilitation to the cancer affected to enable him to be back in the society as a normal & healthy individual. The trust also has a help desk at Tata Memorial hospital & KEM hospital in Mumbai. In addition it has opened its own charitable centre at Ashok Nagar, Chennai where high end treatments are free of cost to the poor & needy. Nearly 700 patients have availed of the facility here so far.
